summary: with this mod when ever you use storm call or if it just rains, it adds cows and chickens that explode when they hit the ground. But beware these can and will land on top of you, your follower, and civilians and kill them.this mod has just begun no stages are currently complete. COMING SOON!!
descriptionHtml: this mod will take a few weeks now since i have a lot to do, it will now rain more often, cows will more like real cows, animals survive (people don\'t), no bounty is added when people die, it is all currently under work
author: cowkid15
